data.title: Brief introduction of Yunnan Lubuge Consulting Co., Ltd.
data.text:
Through optimization reorganization, adjustment and enlargement, Yunnan Lubuge Consulting Co., Ltd. was registered and established in March, 2004 on the basis of human resources and scientific and technological strength of Lubuge Hydro Co., Ltd. of Technology and Industry which was a wholly state-owned enterprise. Its registered trademark is“Lubuge”. The original Lubuge Company’s predecessor was Lubuge Project Construction Management Bureau (LPCMB).

Yunnan Lubuge Consulting Co., Ltd. has not only a group of senior experts, but also a group of young and middle-aged masters and doctors. In which key personnel have been involved in the whole process of construction and management of Lubuge Hydropower Station, and devoted their most effective work to the accumulation and exploration of “Lubuge Experience” for 10 years.

Enterprise Tenet: Actively integrating and utilizing human resources and scientific and technological strength at home and abroad, promoting Lubuge Spirit and sublimating Lubuge Experience, we shall make positive contribution to consulting service and development of science and technology in fundamental construction for Yunnan Province, our entire country and even all humanity. Moreover, we shall create another Lubuge glory. Meanwhile develop and strengthen ourselves continuously in order to become a brand-name enterprise as soon as possible in Yunnan Province.

Business Scope: Scientific research and consulting service in fundamental construction such as materials science, equipment technology and construction technology; Safety monitoring during the periods of engineering construction and operation; Research of antiseismic engineering; Research of project administration, research of project planning and feasibility, project assessment, project consulting service and practice; Engineering investigation and Engineering design; cultivation and academic exchange; Project bidding agency; Engineering construction supervision; Water-soil conservation; Environmental impact statement; Safety evaluation of engineeringã

Project performance on the rockfill dam in recent years: Since April 2004, our company has assumed the safety monitoring technology services and seismic engineering studies in construction period and operation period of Yele Hydropower Station invested by Guodian Sichuan Nanya River Hydropower Development Corp. Ltd. and Qiaoqi Hydropower Station invested by Huaneng Sichuan Baoxing River Hydropower Development Corp. Ltd.. The safety monitoring of rockfill dam is one of the traditional superior business of Lubuge Company. While through our timely, comprehensive and intensive monitoring, analysis and research into Yele and Qiaoqi dam in the 5•12 Wenchuan earthquake, we have enriched and improved our monitoring experience and technical levels.

In September 2009, General Manager of our company was awarded the honorary title of "outstanding contribution person to the development of the construction industry of Yunnan province” by Provincial People's Government.
